definitions.text: a periodical that summarizes the news
something that is compiled (as into a single book or file)
arrange and integrate in the mind
examples: I cannot digest all this information

definitions.text: put up with something or somebody unpleasant
examples: I cannot bear his constant criticism
The new secretary had to endure a lot of unprofessional remarks
he learned to tolerate the heat
She stuck out two years in a miserable marriage
Protein digests in a few hours

definitions.text: systematize, as by classifying and summarizing
examples: the government digested the entire law into a code

definitions.text: soften or disintegrate, as by undergoing exposure to heat or moisture

examples: condense the contents of a book into a summary

definitions.text: soften or disintegrate by means of chemical action, heat, or moisture
